definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
low-paid workers in industries that offer jobs for the unskilled/derogatory-sounding abbr. for 低端產業從業人口|低端产业从业人口

sentences.english: They have more bottom end, a warmer, mellower mid and upper mid-range, and often more top octave.
sentences.chinese: 低端丰满，中频又温又纯，更经常在极高频段更出彩。
星巴克以走低端路线回应。

sentences.english: It's now expecting fiscal-year results at the lower end of expectations.
sentences.chinese: 目前预计本财年公司收益将处在预测区间的低端。

sentences.english: Essentially, then, RIM is making hay in the lower-end of the smartphone market.
sentences.chinese: 基本上RIM是在低端智能手机市场抓住机会。

sentences.english: The company said it will strengthen the sales network in lower-tier cities in the future.
sentences.chinese: 公司称未来将加强在低端城市加强销售网络。

sentences.english: Its lower fixed point is absolute zero.
sentences.chinese: 其低端固定点温度是绝对零度。

sentences.english: Apple has steered away from the low-margin netbook market in favor of higher-end computers.
sentences.chinese: 苹果公司已经放弃低端电脑市场而转向高端市场。

sentences.english: Some low-end systems do not have adequate security nor audit trails.
sentences.chinese: 一些低端系统不会有足够的安全性也不会有查账索引。

sentences.english: Another thing is advancing from the middle and low end to the middle and high end.
sentences.chinese: 还有就是注重从中低端向中高端发展。

sentences.english: Product structure is extremely unreasonable, the low end is held very much.
sentences.chinese: 产品结构极不合理，低端太盛。

sentences.english: Capitalism's ability to take things downmarket also has its limits.
sentences.chinese: 资本主义把事物“低端化”的本领也有其不足之处。

sentences.english: We work intelligently to make things happen on lower specced machines.
sentences.chinese: 我们的工作智慧，能够让低端机器也做那些事情。

sentences.english: Kraft Foods began to manufacturing various products from high-end to low-end.
sentences.chinese: 从高端产品到低端产品，卡夫都有所涉及。

sentences.english: Demand for low-end cellphones has surged across emerging markets since the economic crisis began to ease.
sentences.chinese: 经济危机缓和后整个新兴市场对低端手机需求量激增。

sentences.english: Consequently, low-end retailers have been performing well.
sentences.chinese: 低端零售商销售因此表现不俗。

sentences.english: Low-end manufacturers stayed open by boosting efficiency, says Arthur Kroeber, head of the Dragonomics consultancy.
sentences.chinese: 低端制造业仍停留在推进工作效率而盈利的思维上。

definition: main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
low-grade/of low worth or rank/poor quality/inferior
to fall behind the ranks/to be outdated
